comments.body: Actually a lot of Params in ml.feature is not private, even with setter and getter.
comments.diffHunk:
@@ -44,7 +44,7 @@ class SQLTransformer @Since("1.6.0") (override val uid: String) extends Transfor
    * @group param
    */
   @Since("1.6.0")
-  final val statement: Param[String] = new Param[String](this, "statement", "SQL statement")
+  private final val statement: Param[String] = new Param[String](this, "statement", "SQL statement")

comments.body: They should be public.  Users should be able to reference them in order to do things like create a ParamMap, or print the built-in Param doc.
comments.diffHunk:
@@ -44,7 +44,7 @@ class SQLTransformer @Since("1.6.0") (override val uid: String) extends Transfor
    * @group param
    */
   @Since("1.6.0")
-  final val statement: Param[String] = new Param[String](this, "statement", "SQL statement")
+  private final val statement: Param[String] = new Param[String](this, "statement", "SQL statement")
